questions.question: 1. What is the output characteristic of an n-channel MOSFET?

answers.a: Variation of drain current with gate voltage
answers.b: Variation of drain current with drain-to-source voltage
answers.c: Variation of gate current with drain voltage
answers.d: Variation of gate-to-source voltage with temperature

questions.question: 2. In which region does the n-channel MOSFET behave like a variable resistor?
3. What happens to the MOSFET in the cutoff region?

answers.b: The MOSFET acts as a short circuit
answers.c: The drain current is negligible or zero

questions.question: 4. What condition defines the onset of the saturation region in an n-channel MOSFET?
5. What is the primary factor controlling the drain current in the saturation region?
6. What is the role of the threshold voltage (V_T) in an n-channel MOSFET?

answers.a: It determines the maximum drain current
answers.b: It indicates the onset of conduction between drain and source

questions.question: 7. How does the drain current (I_D) vary with V_DS in the saturation region?
8. Which parameter primarily influences the mobility (Î¼) in a MOSFET?
9. What happens to the n-channel MOSFET when V_G < V_T?

answers.b: The MOSFET enters the linear region
answers.c: The channel does not form, and the MOSFET remains off

questions.question: 10. In which application is the n-channel MOSFET typically used in the saturation region?
